# Developer Information

## Update Clickhouse-cpp dependencies
This library uses an existing C++ Client provided by an Yandex employee. The source is
included as git submodule and can be updated by running the following command:

```{bash}
git subtree pull --prefix src/vendor/clickhouse-cpp/ https://github.com/artpaul/clickhouse-cpp.git master --squash
```
